roleset.name: act of dying off completely

example.name: extinction-n: standard
example.text: Hey ........ 30 years ago , I was reading about all kinds of hysterical doomsday theories of the extinction of this natural resource or that natural resource .

propbank.arg: of this natural resource or that natural resource

roleset.note: EXTINCTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from extinction.01-n)

roleset.name: completely died off

example.name: extinct-j
example.text: Of the 44,838 species assessed worldwide using the IUCN Red List criteria , 905 are extinct and 16,928 are listed as threatened to be extinct .

propbank.arg: Of the 44,838 species assessed worldwide using the IUCN Red List criteria

example.name: extinct-j
example.text: Brisbane River cod are extinct , from overfishing , habitat destruction and siltation , and whole - of - catchment scale bushfires and ash fish kills in the 1930s .

propbank.arg: from overfishing , habitat destruction and siltation , and whole - of - catchment scale bushfires and ash fish kills in the 1930s

roleset.note: EXTINCT-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from extinct.01-j)
